articles.title: Results of a New Study Could Finally Give Us 'Timetables' for Turbulence - ScienceAlert
articles.description: With the right physics, it's possible to blast a box of circuits clear across the Solar System with pinpoint accuracy to come within a whisker of distant worlds.
